item.title: Greek Heroic Age
item.description: 1. Early Heroes Aeacus Cadmus Perseus 2. Generation of Oedipus (two generations before Troy) Oedipus (descendant of Cadmus) Creon 3. Generation the Seven Against Thebes (one generation before Troy) Eteocles Polynices Antigone Ismene Atreus Argonauts Many of the argonauts were fathers of Trojan heroes - Laertes, Peleus, Telamon, etc.
